articles.author: GMA Team
articles.title: 'Golden Bachelor' couple Gerry Turner and Theresa Nist announce they are divorcing - Good Morning America
articles.description: Gerry Turner and Theresa Nist announced in an interview with "Good Morning America" that they are divorcing.
articles.content:
"The Golden Bachelor" couple Gerry Turner and Theresa Nist are getting divorced.
The couple, who fell in love on the first season of "The Golden Bachelor" last fall before tying the knot in a televi… [+3009 chars]
